cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.0)

set(TARGET glad)
project(${TARGET} VERSION 1.0 LANGUAGES C)

add_library(${TARGET})

target_sources(${TARGET} PRIVATE
  include/glad/gl.h
  src/gl.c
)

if (${BUILD_SHARED_LIBS})
  target_compile_definitions(${TARGET} PUBLIC GLAD_API_CALL_EXPORT)
  target_compile_definitions(${TARGET} PRIVATE GLAD_API_CALL_EXPORT_BUILD)
endif()

include(GNUInstallDirs)

target_include_directories(${TARGET} PUBLIC
  $<BUILD_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/${CMAKE_INSTALL_INCLUDEDIR}>
  $<INSTALL_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_INSTALL_INCLUDEDIR}>
)

install(TARGETS ${TARGET}
  EXPORT ${TARGET} DESTINATION ${CMAKE_INSTALL_BINDIR}
  LIBRARY DESTINATION ${CMAKE_INSTALL_LIBDIR}
  PUBLIC_HEADER DESTINATION ${CMAKE_INSTALL_INCLUDEDIR}
  RUNTIME DESTINATION ${CMAKE_INSTALL_BINDIR}
)
